attributes.action: Ease tax burdens for young families
attributes.additional_details:
parents with young children are finding it increasingly difficault to meet the cost of living. Shoes, clothing, school dinners, childcare, clubs, outings, food, education, holidays out of school time (doubled)
Take a look at how the government can ease their tax burden and give them extra funds to help raise their children into creative well rounded people. Surely wealthy pensioners etc with lower costs could contribute more?? We are all on the life cycle, and we need more money to be available at diferent times in our lives
